verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump 's toadies] [V: continue] [ARG1: to flout convention , and likely the law] [ARGM-MNR: with their slimy maneuvering into the Gang of Eight meeting today] .
[ARG0: Trump 's toadies] continue to [V: flout] [ARG1: convention] , and likely the law with their slimy maneuvering into the Gang of Eight meeting today .
